name: RadRecommendation
0:
”Alexa, ask Rad Recommendation what I should eat”
”Alexa, open Rad Recommendation”
”Alexa, ask Rad Recommendation where we should eat”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rad recommendation
des: Have you and your friends or family ever had an argument about where to eat for dinner? That is no longer a problem! Install our skill and simply ask "Alexa, ask Rad Recommendation what we should eat for dinner" and Alexa will respond with a chain restaurant.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
